programme.desc: The Relationship Diremption: Sheldon wonders whether he's wasting his time with his study of string theory. Raj and Emily go on a double date with Howard and Bernadette. (S7 Ep20)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Maggie Gone: When Marge is temporarily blinded, Homer loses Maggie to a convent and Lisa has to go undercover as a nun to find her. (S20 Ep13/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In the Name of the Grandfather: Homer takes the family to Ireland so that Grampa can visit quaint village pub O'Flanagan's one last time. (S20 Ep14/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Anything Can Happen Recurrence: Penny and Leonard distract Sheldon from his career problems by reinstating Anything Can Happen Thursday. Raj asks for Howard's advice. (S7 Ep21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Proton Transmogrification: Sheldon struggles to process his feelings of grief when his idol Professor Proton passes away. The gang gather to celebrate Star Wars Day. (S7 Ep22)

programme.desc: A German Folk Song and an Actual Adult: Georgie goes on a birthday date, and Sheldon takes an interest in Missy's favourite TV show. (S6 Ep17)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Shiksa Indeterminacy: Leonard, Raj and Howard all fall heavily for Sheldon's twin sister, but when Leonard comes up with a plan to win her heart, it's derailed by Sheldon. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Peanut Reaction: Penny throws a surprise party for Leonard, with help from Howard and Raj, but Sheldon's indulgence in an electronics shop throws her off track. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tangerine Factor: When Penny breaks up with her boyfriend, Leonard plucks up the courage to ask her out. And each of them turns to Sheldon for advice about their date. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Frankenstein's Monster and a Crazy Church Guy: Sheldon helps his roommate on the stock market, Missy and Billy have a party, and Mary finds a new church. (S7 Ep5)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Baptists, Catholics and an Attempted Drowning: Georgie and Mandy's wedding plans pit Mary against Mandy's mum, Audrey, with baby CeeCee caught in the middle. (S7 Ep6)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Manny Get Your Gun: Everyone gathers at a restaurant to celebrate Manny's birthday, although Manny himself is experiencing a mini-life crisis about getting older. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mother Tucker: Cameron loves his mum, so Mitchell isn't sure how to tell Cam that she makes him uncomfortable. When Haley breaks up with Dylan, Phil takes it harder than anyone. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Homer They Fall: Homer becomes a boxer, thanks to his abnormally hard head. But is his skull strong enough for a fight against heavyweight champion Drederick Tatum? (S8 Ep3/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Burns, Baby Burns: Homer concocts a scam with Mr Burns' long-lost illegitimate son Larry (guest star Rodney Dangerfield). (S8 Ep4/25)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Friendship Algorithm: Sheldon develops a scientific procedure for making friends when he discovers that Kripke has control of a new supercomputer at the university. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Financial Permeability: When Sheldon lends Penny some money, it brings her ex-boyfriend Kurt back into her life, with negative consequences for the gang. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Maternal Capacitance: A disastrous visit from Leonard's mother, Beverly, has the unexpected side-effect of bringing Leonard and Penny closer together. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror XIII: Homer's cloning hammock spirals out of control, and Lisa's meddling leaves Springfield vulnerable to zombie attack. (S14 Ep1/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Now Museum, Now You Don't: Lisa explores the wonders of western art. She becomes Lisanardo, and Bart turns into a French impressionist. (S32 Ep3)

programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/96. With a huge trip to Newcastle looming, United looked to keep the pressure on at the top by beating struggling Bolton.

programme.title: PL: United v Nottm Forest 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 28/4/96. United ended their home campaign against Nottingham Forest, knowing that a win would take them to the brink of the Premiership title.

programme.title: PL: United v Sunderland 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/96. United took on Sunderland for the first time in the Premier League on what was to be a memorable afternoon at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: Nottm Forest v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives 6/2/99. Former United boss Ron Atkinson was hoping to get one over his old club when they visited the City Ground with Forest deep in relegation trouble.

programme.title: PL: United v Southampton 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/00. United welcomed struggling Southampton looking to keep up their scintillating home form, having scored 22 goals in their opening six league contests at the Theatre of Dreams.

programme.title: PL: United v Derby 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 12/12/2001. After 3 Successive League defeats, United hoped to rediscover their form at home to Derby.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward swallows his clarinet and Sandy offers to shrink herself into a mini submarine to get it back in 'Squidtastic Voyage', then in 'That's No Lady', Patrick thinks he's a wanted starfish.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd i'r ardd i gael hwyl yn yr haul! Maen nhw'n cwrdd ag anifeiliaid yr ardd hefyd. Harmony, Melody and Bop go to the garden to have fun in the sun!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Lon Las, Swansea, to create a treasure.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i'r Pawenlu weithio fel tm i orchfygu Maer Campus a'i gathod bach. The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Campus and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae nifer o drigolion glannau'r afon 'u llygaid ar ellyg aeddfed Crawc. Mae Gwich yn cynnig gwarchod y goeden gellyg... Ratty offers to guard Toad's pear tree - but it disappears!

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd gan Dewi'r hyder i berfformio fel cerflun byw ar ei ddiwrnod mawr yng Ngwyl Nol a Mlan? Dewi's plan is to raise money for the local festival by performing as a robot living statue!

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae gan Fflwff reddf am guddio ac yn mwynhau dilyn Brethyn o gwmpas heb iddo sylwi! Fluff has an instinct for hiding and gets a big kick out of following Tweedy without him noticing!

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Meg yn gofyn 'Pam bod cymylau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n ateb efo stori am ei Ddad-cu e, oedd yn hedfan cymylau'r byd i achub anifeiliaid! Today, Meg asks 'What are clouds for?'

programme.title: New: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni'n credu bod Capsiwl Dyffryn Dryswch yn llawn trysor. Ond mae'r dihirod yn hefyd, ac yn benderfynol o'i ddwyn! Joni's convinced that the Dyffryn Dryswch Capsule is full of treasure!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical adventure as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan fydd siarc rhesog yn llyncu camera sydd gan Ceri y crwban mr, ac yna yn bygwth Ceri ei hun, mae'n rhaid i Ira a'r Octonots ddod i'w hachub. A turtle needs rescuing from a tiger shark.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Dere ar antur geiriau gyda'r Cywion Bach wrth iddyn nhw ddysgu gair arbennig heddiw, sef 'beic'. Ding ding! The Cywion Bach learn a special word today - 'beic' (bike). Ding Ding!

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond pan mae'r gwres canolog yn torri, does neb yn edrych ymlaen i gael person dieithr yn y ty i'w drwsio. The central heating breaks - uh-oh!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Haul druan yn teimlo'n sl. Sut gall y Cymylaubychain ei helpu i deimlo'n well? Sun's feeling poorly. What can make him feel better?

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Ymunwch Dona Direidi wrth iddi gynnal parti pen-blwydd llawn hwyl. Heddiw, bydd Tesni yn cael parti pitsa gyda Tref y ci. Today, Tesni will be having a pizza party with Tref the dog.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: Seland Newydd. Yma byddwn ni'n ymweld 'r brifddinas Wellington, yn dysgu am y bobl Maori, ac yn edrych ar symbolau cenedlaethol fel yr aderyn ciwi. We take a trip to New Zealand.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff

programme.title: Don't Look In The Basement
programme.desc: 1973. Horror. Directed by S. F. Brownrigg and starring Bill McGhee, Jesse Lee Fulton and Robert Dracup. A young nurse goes to work in an asylum. There follows a murder - will she be next? [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: After a thrilling and frightful night, Caroline Munro is ready to close the doors of The Cellar Club, but not before allowing a peek at next weeks marvellous films. [S]

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: 1993. Thriller. Director: Harold Becker. Stars Alec Baldwin, Nicole Kidman & Bill Pullman. The life of a married couple is severely disrupted after an enigmatic surgeon is invited into their home. [S]

programme.title: The Turners of Prospect Road
programme.desc: 1947. Comedy. Directed by Maurice J. Wilson. Stars: Wilfrid Lawson, Helena Pickard, Maureen Glynne. An abandoned greyhound puppy is trained to race after being found by a taxi driver. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Great Feud. 1962. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Donna Douglas & Raymond Bailey. The Clampett clan takes great offense when Sonny jilts Elly, and they start a feud with the Drysdales. [S]

programme.title: Amos Burke: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Terror in a Tiny Town: Part 1. When Burke investigates the strange death of an atomic plant security officer, he finds a town in which the residents respond in robotic ways.

programme.title: What a Whopper
programme.desc: 1960. Comedy. What a Whopper is a comedy from former documentarist Gilbert Gunn. Adam Faith stars in this tale about a struggling writer who fakes photographs of the Loch Ness monster. [S]

programme.title: Dangerous Cargo
programme.desc: 1954. Drama directed by John Harlow. Tim (Jack Watling) is tricked by a wartime friend (Terence Alexander) into revealing details of a gold shipment. [S]

programme.title: Tonight in Great Britain
programme.desc: 1955. A star studded short film featuring Tessie O'Shea, Eddie Gray and Max Bygraves at the London Palladium, Hattie Jacques at the Players' Theatre, Jean Carson at the Caf de Paris and many more!

programme.title: Now Barabbas Was a Robber
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Gordon Parry. Stars Richard Greene, Cedric Hardwicke & Kathleen Harrison. Prison drama about a variety of criminals and their life behind bars in post-war Britain. [S]

programme.title: Train of Events
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Sidney Cole, Charles Crichton and Basil Dearden. Starring Jack Warner, Susan Shaw and Gladys Henson. A train disaster is told as four short stories. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Partings. 1974. Stars Jean Anderson, Margaret Ashcroft & Jennifer Wilson. Edward and Brian meet with a merchant banker about Hammonds going public. Meanwhile, Gwen settles in as Mary's companion. [S]

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: 1955. Western. Directed by Carl K. Hittleman. Stars Chill Wills & Lance Fuller. While escorting a wagon of rifles, a cowboy must find a way to outsmart the Comanche Indians who plan to steal them. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Boot Hill. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Reed Hadley, Denver Pyle. A reluctant Bill accepts a job to become his old friend's deputy, even though several deputies before him were killed. [S]

programme.title: Booby Trap
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. An absent-minded professor invents a pen that will explode on the sound of bells... then leaves it in a taxi. Starring Sydney Tafler and Harry Fowler. [S]

programme.title: A Symphony Of London
programme.desc: A portrait of London life in the late 30s. Insight into travel, trade and traffic with some great scenes of Covent Garden and Piccadilly. All interwoven with a love story between two little dogs.

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Manslaughter. 1976. Stars Allan O'Keefe & Jeffrey Kissoon. The public expect to be protected by the police. But if a policeman kills a member of the public, will the protector be protected? [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: The Death-Wish. 1970. Stars Peter Barkworth, Philip Madoc & James Maxwell. In Paris, Vincent is offered his freedom but is pressured to give up his friends. How can he be sure it is not a trap? [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Mrs. Four and her Children. 1999. Stars Bruno Cremer, Marianne Basler & Christian Morin. Maigret investigates a chemist's wife who accused her husband of murder and claimed to have seen a corpse. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The Crime at Lock 14. 1963. Stars Rupert Davies, Hugh Burden & Isa Miranda. A yacht and a barge meet in the traffic of the canals, with their passing resulting in murder. [S]

programme.title: Fools Rush In
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Victor H. Komow. Stars Frank Silvera, Ken Buckridge & Jean Alexander. A ship with a cargo full of diamonds gets taken over by pirates. [S]

programme.title: Mademoiselle
programme.desc: 1966. Drama. Directed by Tony Richardson. Stars Jeanne Moreau, Ettore Manni & Keith Skinner. A schoolteacher channels her repressed passion into secret acts of violence and destruction. [S]

programme.title: Mademoiselle
programme.desc: 1966. Drama. Directed by Tony Richardson. Stars Jeanne Moreau, Ettore Manni & Keith Skinner. A schoolteacher channels her repressed passion into secret acts of violence and destruction. [S]

programme.title: Resurrection of Zachary Wheeler
programme.desc: 1971. Sci-Fi starring Leslie Nielsen, Bradford Dillman and Don Haggerty. After a terrible car accident, a presidential candidate awakens in a New Mexico clinic without a trace of injury. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Having a Baby
programme.desc: 1964. A remarkable look at the medical and social services available for both hospital and home births.

programme.title: Richard Diamond: Private Detective
programme.desc: The Mouse. 1960. Stars David Janssen, Russ Conway & Narda Onyx. Diamond is hired by a woman who is being threatened by a man she saw die 15 years earlier.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Shy Ballerina. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Dr. Watson comes home with another man's coat. The other man is murdered late that same night. [S]

programme.title: The Way Out
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director Montgomery Tully. Stars Gene Nelson, Mona Freeman & John Bentley. A man tells his wife he is being framed for murder, but the more she helps the more holes she finds. [S]

programme.title: Tons of Trouble
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. Directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. Stars Richard Hearne & William Hartnell. Mr Pastry names the apartment boilers he maintains 'Mavis and Ethel'. Trouble begins when he faces the sack. [S]

programme.title: Love In Pawn
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Penniless couple Roger (Bernard Braden) and Jean (Barbara Kelly) will get 10,000 if Roger can live a sober and profitable life. Starring Reg Dixon and John Laurie. [S]

programme.title: Heavens Above!
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Directed by John & Roy Boulting. Stars Peter Sellers, Ian Carmichael, Cecil Parker & Eric Sykes. Due to mistaken identity, a minister is accidently appointed to a snobbish parish. [S]

programme.title: Cover Girl Killer
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Someone is murdering cover girl models, leaving them in the same pose and place as featured in 'Wow' magazine. Stars: Harry H. Corbett, Felicity Young. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Most Expensive Steak in the World - Part 1. 1973. Stars Ronald Radd & James Copeland. An Argentinian rancher is suing a Scottish beef farmer after he bought a bull which was impotent. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Most Expensive Steak in the World - Part 2. 1973. Stars Milton Johns & Ronald Radd. Gus Enderby takes to the stand and tells how Angelos Da Costa conspired with him to rig the auction. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Most Expensive Steak in the World - Part 3. 1973. Stars Duncan Lamont, Hal Galili & John Alkin. Veterinary surgeon Michael Shipton and American vet Frank Brady both give evidence. [S]

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cities
programme.desc: 1958. Drama. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Dorothy Tutin, Cecil Parker & Stephen Murray. During the French Revolution, Lucie Manette falls in love with a duplicitous Englishman. [S]

programme.title: Mr. Beamish Goes South
programme.desc: 1953. Mystery. Directed by Oscar Burn & John Wall. Stars John Laurie & Hector Ross. An amateur detective pursues a seaside serial killer who disposes of his female victims in an acid bath. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: The Authentic McCoy. 1961. Stars John Ireland, Bill Nagy, Neil Hallett. When penniless Henry McCoy dies, his lawyer discovers he was once rich and plans to get the cash before his son shows up. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Oranges and Lemons. 1976. Stars Colin Baker, Carole Mowlam & Jennifer Wilson. Merroney tests Jennifer upon her return to the firm. Bored with their marriage, Gwen issues Bill an ultimatum. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: The Watcher. 1984. Stars Leigh Lawson & Con O'Neill. Lomax's search for his son brings him to an isolated and unwelcoming Welsh village. Things get worse for him when a young girl goes missing. [S]

programme.title: The Gold Robbers
programme.desc: An Oddly Honest Man. 1969. Stars Peter Vaughan, Ian Hendry & Wanda Ventham. The pilot who flew the plane, appears to be prepared to spill the beans. But can Cradock really trust the man? [S]

programme.title: The Glass
programme.desc: Episode 4. 2001. Stars John Thaw, Sarah Lancashire & Paul Jesson. No more games. Duggan's secrets are out. Proctor confronts Duggan about his sabotage of the company. [S]

programme.desc: 1990. Thriller. Directed by Peter Smith. Stars Jeroen Krabb, Suzanna Hamilton & Joanna Pearce. A crook finds his past catching up with him in the shape of the ex-girlfriend he thought was dead.

programme.desc: Luna Sees the Light: When the Dino Ranchers use lights to communicate with a deaf Parasaur, the baby dino uses them to guide her herd to safety in a snowstorm. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Sonny Daze: Sonny the Kid gets under Jon's skin when he cheats during a dino tournament. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Rebel's Wonderful Way: When Blitz tries to teach Rebel how to be Dino Rancher, he mistakenly pushes his little student to do things his way and puts Rebel in trouble. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Goliath's Little Helper: Clover learns that even though he's not strong enough yet to be a barn builder like his grandpa, his job on the Ranch is just as important (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Have You Herd?: When a quirky little stego finds more joy acting like a compy, Jon and Blitz have a hard time try-ing to get him to fit in with the stegosaurs. (S1 Ep28)
